steps.title: Essentials
steps.description: Start by adding a title and URLs for your data set.

name.label: Title
name.help: Enter a concise title. You will be able to enter a more thorough description in the next step.

files.label: Files
files.help: Provide one or multiple urls to your data set files.

steps.title: Information
steps.description: Further describe and categorize your data set to help people discover it.

description.label: Description
description.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible.
description.placeholder: e.g. 3 sources of material for affordable shelter.

categories.label: Category
categories.help: Pick a category which best fits your data set.

tags.label: Technologies
tags.help: Pick technology which best fits your data set.

dateCreated.label: Creation Date
dateCreated.help: Select the date the asset was created, or was updated for the last time.

steps.title: Authorship
steps.description: Give proper attribution for your data set.

license.label: License
options: PDDL: Public Domain Dedication and License

steps.title: Register
steps.description: Splendid, we got all the data. Now let's register your data set.
steps.content: After clicking the button below you will be asked by your wallet to sign this request.
